Class CallbackRegistryImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.jpa.event.internal.jpa.CallbackRegistryImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, CallbackRegistry

    public class CallbackRegistryImpl
extends Object
implements CallbackRegistry
    Keep track of all lifecycle callbacks and listeners for a given persistence unit
